query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 ‘Per me si va ne la città dolente, 2 per me si va ne l’etterno dolore, 3 per me si va tra la perduta gente.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Through me you go into the city of woe, 2 through me you go into eternal pain, 3 through me you go among the lost people.
**Malay:**
1 Melaluiku kamu pergi ke kota kesengsaraan, 2 melaluiku kamu pergi ke dalam kesakitan abadi, 3 melaluiku kamu pergi di antara orang-orang yang terhilang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Giustizia mosse il mio alto fattore; 5 fecemi la divina podestate, 6 la somma sapïenza e ’l primo amore.
query.result:
**English:**
4 Justice moved my exalted Maker; 5 divine power made me, 6 supreme wisdom and primal love.
**Malay:**
4 Keadilan menggerakkan Penciptaku yang agung; 5 kekuasaan ilahi menjadikan aku, 6 kebijaksanaan tertinggi dan cinta pertama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Dinanzi a me non fuor cose create 8 se non etterne, e io etterno duro. 9 Lasciate ogne speranza, voi ch’intrate’.
query.result:
**English:**
7 Before me there were no created things 8 except eternal ones, and I endure eternally. 9 Abandon all hope, you who enter here.
**Malay:**
7 Di hadapanku tidak ada hal-hal yang diciptakan 8 kecuali yang kekal, dan aku kekal abadi. 9 Tinggalkan semua harapan, kamu yang masuk ke sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Queste parole di colore oscuro 11 vid’ ïo scritte al sommo d’una porta; 12 per ch’io: «Maestro, il senso lor m’è duro».
query.result:
**English:**
10 These words of dark color 11 I saw written at the top of a gate; 12 because of which I said: "Master, their meaning is hard for me".
**Malay:**
10 Kata-kata berwarna gelap ini 11 kulihat tertulis di puncak sebuah pintu gerbang; 12 karena itu aku berkata: "Guru, maknanya sulit bagiku".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Ed elli a me, come persona accorta: 14 «Qui si convien lasciare ogne sospetto; 15 ogne viltà convien che qui sia morta.
query.result:
**English:**
13 And he to me, as a person who is wise: 14 "Here it is necessary to abandon all suspicion; 15 all cowardice must die here.
**Malay:**
13 Dan dia kepadaku, sebagai orang yang bijaksana: 14 "Di sini harus meninggalkan semua kecurigaan; 15 semua kepengecutan harus mati di sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Noi siam venuti al loco ov’ i’ t’ho detto 17 che tu vedrai le genti dolorose 18 c’hanno perduto il ben de l’intelletto».
query.result:
**English:**
16 We have come to the place of which I told you, 17 where you will see the sorrowful people 18 who have lost the good of the intellect.
**Malay:**
16 Kami telah sampai di tempat yang telah kukatakan kepadamu, 17 di mana kamu akan melihat orang-orang yang bersedih 18 yang telah kehilangan kebaikan akal budi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 E poi che la sua mano a la mia puose 20 con lieto volto, ond’ io mi confortai, 21 mi mise dentro a le segrete cose.
query.result:
**English:**
19 And after she placed her hand in mine 20 with a joyful face, which comforted me, 21 she led me into the secret things.
**Malay:**
19 Dan setelah dia meletakkan tangannya di tanganku 20 dengan wajah gembira, yang menghiburku, 21 dia membawaku ke dalam hal-hal rahasia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Quivi sospiri, pianti e alti guai 23 risonavan per l’aere sanza stelle, 24 per ch’io al cominciar ne lagrimai.
query.result:
**English:**
22 There sighs, cries, and loud lamentations 23 resounded through the starless air, 24 so that at the beginning I wept.
**Malay:**
22 Di sana desahan, tangisan, dan ratapan nyaring 23 bergema di udara yang tak berbintang, 24 sehingga pada awalnya aku menangis.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Diverse lingue, orribili favelle, 26 parole di dolore, accenti d’ira, 27 voci alte e fioche, e suon di man con elle
28 facevano un tumulto, il qual s’aggira 29 sempre in quell’ aura sanza tempo tinta, 30 come la rena quando turbo spira.
query.result:
**English:**
25 Diverse tongues, horrible languages, 26 words of pain, accents of anger, 27 loud and hoarse voices, and sounds of hands with them
28 made a tumult, which whirls around 29 always in that air stained without time, 30 like the sand when a whirlwind blows.
**Malay:**
25 Bahasa yang berbeza, pertuturan yang mengerikan, 26 kata-kata kesakitan, nada kemarahan, 27 suara yang kuat dan serak, dan bunyi tangan bersama mereka
28 membuat kekecohan, yang berputar-putar 29 sentiasa di udara yang ternoda tanpa waktu itu, 30 seperti pasir ketika angin puyuh bertiup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 E io ch’avea d’error la testa cinta, 32 dissi: «Maestro, che è quel ch’i’ odo? 33 e che gent’ è che par nel duol sì vinta?».
query.result:
**English:**
31 And I, whose head was in love with error, 32 said: "Master, what is that which I hear? 33 And what people are these who seem so overcome with grief?"
**Malay:**
31 Dan aku, yang kepalaku dipenuhi cinta akan kesalahan, 32 berkata: "Guru, apakah yang kudengar itu? 33 Dan orang-orang apakah mereka yang tampak begitu dikuasai duka?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Ed elli a me: «Questo misero modo 35 tegnon l’anime triste di coloro 36 che visser sanza ’nfamia e sanza lodo.
query.result:
**English:**
34 And he to me: "This wretched mode 35 the sad souls of those who lived 36 without infamy or praise maintain.
**Malay:**
34 Dan dia kepadaku: "Cara hidup yang menyedihkan ini 35 dijalani oleh jiwa-jiwa sedih dari mereka yang hidup 36 tanpa kehinaan atau pujian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Mischiate sono a quel cattivo coro 38 de li angeli che non furon ribelli 39 né fur fedeli a Dio, ma per sé fuoro.
query.result:
**English:**
37 Mingled are with that evil choir 38 of the angels who were neither rebellious 39 nor faithful to God, but were for themselves.
**Malay:**
37 Bercampurlah dengan paduan suara yang jahat itu 38 para malaikat yang tidak memberontak 39 dan tidak setia kepada Tuhan, tetapi untuk diri mereka sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Caccianli i ciel per non esser men belli, 41 né lo profondo inferno li riceve, 42 ch’alcuna gloria i rei avrebber d’elli».
query.result:
**English:**
40 Heaven hunts them so that they may not be less beautiful, 41 and deep hell does not receive them, 42 for the kings would have some glory from them.
**Malay:**
40 Syurga memburu mereka agar mereka tidak kurang cantik, 41 dan neraka yang dalam tidak menerima mereka, 42 karena para raja akan mendapatkan sedikit kemuliaan dari mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 E io: «Maestro, che è tanto greve 44 a lor che lamentar li fa sì forte?». 45 Rispuose: «Dicerolti molto breve.
query.result:
**English:**
43 And I: "Master, what is so grievous 44 to those who make them lament so loudly?" 45 He replied: "I will tell you very briefly.
**Malay:**
43 Dan aku: "Guru, apakah yang begitu menyedihkan 44 bagi mereka yang membuat mereka meratap begitu keras?" 45 Ia menjawab: "Akan kukatakan kepadamu dengan sangat singkat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Questi non hanno speranza di morte, 47 e la lor cieca vita è tanto bassa, 48 che ’nvidïosi son d’ogne altra sorte.
query.result:
**English:**
46 These have no hope of death, 47 and their blind life is so base, 48 that they are envious of every other fate.
**Malay:**
46 Mereka ini tidak mempunyai harapan untuk mati, 47 dan kehidupan buta mereka sangat hina, 48 sehingga mereka iri dengan nasib yang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Fama di loro il mondo esser non lassa; 50 misericordia e giustizia li sdegna: 51 non ragioniam di lor, ma guarda e passa».
query.result:
**English:**
49 The world does not allow their fame to be; 50 mercy and justice disdain them: 51 let us not speak of them, but look and pass on."
**Malay:**
49 Dunia tidak membenarkan kemasyhuran mereka; 50 belas kasihan dan keadilan membenci mereka: 51 janganlah kita bicarakan mereka, tetapi lihatlah dan teruskan perjalanan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Poscia ch’io v’ebbi alcun riconosciuto, 59 vidi e conobbi l’ombra di colui 60 che fece per viltade il gran rifiuto.
query.result:
**English:**
58 After I had recognized some of them, 59 I saw and recognized the shade of him 60 who made the great refusal through cowardice.
**Malay:**
58 Setelah aku mengenali beberapa dari mereka, 59 aku melihat dan mengenali bayangan orang 60 yang melakukan penolakan besar karena pengecut.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Incontanente intesi e certo fui 62 che questa era la setta d’i cattivi, 63 a Dio spiacenti e a’ nemici sui.
query.result:
**English:**
61 Immediately I knew and was certain 62 that this was the sect of the wicked, 63 displeasing to God and to His enemies.
**Malay:**
61 Seketika itu juga aku tahu dan yakin 62 bahwa ini adalah golongan orang-orang jahat, 63 yang tidak disukai Tuhan dan musuh-musuh-Nya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Questi sciaurati, che mai non fur vivi, 65 erano ignudi e stimolati molto 66 da mosconi e da vespe ch’eran ivi.
query.result:
**English:**
64 These wretches, who never were alive, 65 were naked and much tormented 66 by gadflies and wasps that were there.
**Malay:**
64 Orang-orang celaka ini, yang tidak pernah hidup, 65 telanjang dan sangat tersiksa 66 oleh lalat pengganggu dan tawon yang ada di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Elle rigavan lor di sangue il volto, 68 che, mischiato di lagrime, a’ lor piedi 69 da fastidiosi vermi era ricolto.
query.result:
**English:**
67 They bathed their faces in blood, 68 which, mixed with tears, was gathered at their feet 69 by disgusting worms.
**Malay:**
67 Mereka membasahi wajah mereka dengan darah, 68 yang, bercampur dengan air mata, terkumpul di kaki mereka 69 oleh cacing-cacing yang menjijikkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 E poi ch’a riguardar oltre mi diedi, 71 vidi genti a la riva d’un gran fiume; 72 per ch’io dissi: «Maestro, or mi concedi
73 ch’i’ sappia quali sono, e qual costume 74 le fa di trapassar parer sì pronte, 75 com’ i’ discerno per lo fioco lume».
query.result:
**English:**
70 And then, when I gave myself to looking further, 71 I saw people on the bank of a great river; 72 wherefore I said: "Master, now grant me
73 that I may know who they are, and what custom 74 makes them seem so ready to cross over, 75 as I discern by the faint light".
**Malay:**
70 Dan kemudian, ketika aku memberikan diriku untuk melihat lebih jauh, 71 aku melihat orang-orang di tepi sungai yang besar; 72 oleh karena itu aku berkata: "Guru, sekarang kabulkanlah permintaanku
73 agar aku tahu siapa mereka, dan kebiasaan apakah 74 yang membuat mereka tampak begitu siap untuk menyeberang, 75 seperti yang aku lihat melalui cahaya yang redup".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Ed elli a me: «Le cose ti fier conte 77 quando noi fermerem li nostri passi 78 su la trista riviera d’Acheronte».
query.result:
**English:**
76 And he to me: "Things will be fully revealed to you 77 when we stop our steps 78 on the sad shore of Acheron."
**Malay:**
76 Dan dia kepadaku: "Hal-hal akan sepenuhnya terungkap kepadamu 77 ketika kita menghentikan langkah-langkah kita 78 di tepi sungai Acheron yang menyedihkan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Allor con li occhi vergognosi e bassi, 80 temendo no ’l mio dir li fosse grave, 81 infino al fiume del parlar mi trassi.
query.result:
**English:**
79 Then with downcast and ashamed eyes, 80 fearing that my speech might be offensive to him, 81 I dragged myself to the river of speech.
**Malay:**
79 Kemudian dengan mata yang malu dan tertunduk, 80 takut bahwa ucapanku akan menyinggung perasaannya, 81 aku menyeret diriku ke sungai perkataan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Ed ecco verso noi venir per nave 83 un vecchio, bianco per antico pelo, 84 gridando: «Guai a voi, anime prave!
85 Non isperate mai veder lo cielo: 86 i’ vegno per menarvi a l’altra riva 87 ne le tenebre etterne, in caldo e ’n gelo.
query.result:
**English:**
82 And behold, towards us came by boat 83 an old man, white with ancient hair, 84 crying out: "Woe to you, wicked souls!
85 Do not hope to ever see heaven: 86 I come to take you to the other shore 87 into eternal darkness, into heat and ice.
**Malay:**
82 Dan lihatlah ke arah kami datang dengan perahu 83 seorang lelaki tua, beruban karena rambutnya yang kuno, 84 berteriak: "Celakalah kamu, jiwa-jiwa yang jahat!
85 Jangan pernah berharap untuk melihat surga: 86 Aku datang untuk membawamu ke pantai yang lain 87 ke dalam kegelapan abadi, ke dalam panas dan dingin.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 E tu che se’ costì, anima viva, 89 pàrtiti da cotesti che son morti». 90 Ma poi che vide ch’io non mi partiva,
91 disse: «Per altra via, per altri porti 92 verrai a piaggia, non qui, per passare: 93 più lieve legno convien che ti porti».
query.result:
**English:**
88 And you who are there, a living soul, 89 departed from those who are dead." 90 But when he saw that I did not depart,
91 he said: "By another way, by other passages 92 you will come to shore, not here, to cross over: 93 a lighter vessel must carry you."
**Malay:**
88 Dan engkau yang ada di sana, jiwa yang hidup, 89 berpisah dari mereka yang telah mati." 90 Tetapi ketika dia melihat bahwa aku tidak pergi,
91 dia berkata: "Melalui jalan lain, melalui pelabuhan lain 92 engkau akan sampai ke pantai, bukan di sini, untuk menyeberang: 93 perahu yang lebih ringan harus membawamu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 E ’l duca lui: «Caron, non ti crucciare: 95 vuolsi così colà dove si puote 96 ciò che si vuole, e più non dimandare».
query.result:
**English:**
94 And the leader said to him: "Charon, do not be angry: 95 it is so willed there where what is willed can be done, 96 and ask no more."
**Malay:**
94 Dan pemimpin itu berkata kepadanya: "Charon, jangan marah: 95 begitulah yang dikehendaki di tempat yang dapat dikehendaki 96 apa yang diinginkan, dan jangan bertanya lagi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Quinci fuor quete le lanose gote 98 al nocchier de la livida palude, 99 che ’ntorno a li occhi avea di fiamme rote.
query.result:
**English:**
97 Thence he thrust forth those nostrils, dripping 98 at the ferryman of the livid marsh, 99 who had eyes circled with red flames.
**Malay:**
97 Dari situ ia menjulurkan lubang hidungnya yang basah 98 ke arah pendayung rawa yang pucat, 99 yang matanya dikelilingi oleh api merah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Ma quell’ anime, ch’eran lasse e nude, 101 cangiar colore e dibattero i denti, 102 ratto che ’nteser le parole crude.
query.result:
**English:**
100 But those souls, who were weary and naked, 101 changed color and gnashed their teeth, 102 as soon as they heard the harsh words.
**Malay:**
100 Tetapi jiwa-jiwa itu, yang lelah dan telanjang, 101 berubah warna dan menggertakkan gigi, 102 segera setelah mereka mendengar kata-kata kasar itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Bestemmiavano Dio e lor parenti, 104 l’umana spezie e ’l loco e ’l tempo e ’l seme 105 di lor semenza e di lor nascimenti.
query.result:
**English:**
103 They blasphemed God and their parents, 104 the human race, the place, the time, and the seed 105 of their seed and of their births.
**Malay:**
103 Mereka menghujat Tuhan dan orang tua mereka, 104 spesies manusia, tempat, waktu, dan benih 105 benih mereka dan kelahiran mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Poi si ritrasser tutte quante insieme, 107 forte piangendo, a la riva malvagia 108 ch’attende ciascun uom che Dio non teme.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Then they all gathered together again, 107 weeping loudly, on the evil shore 108 that awaits every man who does not fear God.
**Malay:**
106 Kemudian mereka semua berkumpul bersama lagi, 107 menangis dengan kuat, di pantai yang jahat 108 yang menanti setiap orang yang tidak takut kepada Tuhan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Caron dimonio, con occhi di bragia 110 loro accennando, tutte le raccoglie; 111 batte col remo qualunque s’adagia.
query.result:
**English:**
109 Charon the demon, with eyes of burning coal, 110 beckoning to them, gathers them all; 111 he beats with his oar anyone who hesitates.
**Malay:**
109 Caron si iblis, dengan mata bara api, 110 memberi isyarat kepada mereka, mengumpulkan mereka semua; 111 dia memukul dengan dayungnya siapa pun yang ragu-ragu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Come d’autunno si levan le foglie 113 l’una appresso de l’altra, fin che ’l ramo 114 vede a la terra tutte le sue spoglie,
115 similemente il mal seme d’Adamo 116 gittansi di quel lito ad una ad una, 117 per cenni come augel per suo richiamo.
query.result:
**English:**
112 As in autumn the leaves fall, 113 one after the other, until the branch 114 sees all its spoils upon the ground,
115 in the same way the evil seed of Adam 116 cast themselves down from that bank one by one, 117 at signals like birds at their call.
**Malay:**
112 Seperti pada musim gugur daun-daun berguguran, 113 satu demi satu, hingga dahan 114 melihat semua rampasannya di tanah,
115 dengan cara yang sama benih jahat Adam 116 melemparkan diri mereka dari tepi itu satu per satu, 117 dengan isyarat seperti burung pada panggilannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Così sen vanno su per l’onda bruna, 119 e avanti che sien di là discese, 120 anche di qua nuova schiera s’auna.
query.result:
**English:**
118 Thus they go on over the brown wave, 119 and before those on the other side have disembarked, 120 another new group gathers on this side.
**Malay:**
118 Begitulah mereka pergi di atas ombak coklat, 119 dan sebelum mereka di seberang sana turun, 120 kelompok baru lainnya berkumpul di sisi ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Quinci non passa mai anima buona; 128 e però, se Caron di te si lagna, 129 ben puoi sapere omai che ’l suo dir suona».
query.result:
**English:**
127 No good soul ever passes this way; 128 and therefore, if Charon complains about you, 129 you can now understand what his words mean.
**Malay:**
127 Tidak ada jiwa yang baik yang pernah melewati jalan ini; 128 dan oleh karena itu, jika Charon mengeluh tentangmu, 129 sekarang kamu dapat mengerti apa maksud perkataannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Finito questo, la buia campagna 131 tremò sì forte, che de lo spavento 132 la mente di sudore ancor mi bagna.
query.result:
**English:**
130 When this was finished, the dark countryside 131 trembled so violently that, from the terror, 132 my mind is still bathed in sweat.
**Malay:**
130 Setelah ini selesai, kawasan pedesaan yang gelap 131 bergetar begitu kuatnya, sehingga karena ketakutan itu 132 pikiranku masih basah oleh keringat.
